name: (R) ESTAR 120V HPWH FS
_description: ENERGY STAR 120V electric storage heat pump water heater in 2024, existing homes

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Integrated 120V 15A for existing homes to avoid panel upgrade, consistent with costs

source_data.title: ENERGY STAR Program Requirements : Product Specification for Residential Water Heaters
source_data.author: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency

notes: Average of ENERGY STAR v4.0 total installed cost range
added costs of $250 for a 120V circuit for the water heater based on the lower bound of the upgrade/new branch circuit cost in NV5 report

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies: Appendix A
source_data.author: U.S. Energy Information Administration

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average lifetime for ENERGY STAR v4.0 unit in 2022, rounded down from 15.1 years
